Takwimu is a free and open information service transforming the way development decisions are made in Africa

", "cta_two_url": "", "question": "What is Takwimu?", "cta_two_name": "", "cta_one_url": "https://takwimu.zendesk.com/"}}, {"type": "faq", "id": "e45ccc44-115e-42bd-a335-2ac862e2a1ef", "value": {"answer": "

Uneven access to quality development information obstructs local participation and weakens the impact of policy and programming in Africa. Development actors, particularly those with limited resources, face challenges in navigating and influencing the political processes that drive development outcomes so they are effectively locked out and their voices are not heard.
